response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from us at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a savings of $200,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this offer not only provides you with substantial value but also secures your position as a distinguished client. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information.", "product_price": 1100000}
